abstract: Television program X-Factor is adding a Twitter voting option, recognizing the immediate power and influence of the micro-blogging platform and taking advantage of new technological investment by Twitter in its growth.
snippet: Next week, viewers of “The X-Factor” can vote for a singer via Twitter in a partnership intended to strengthen the symbiotic relationship between television and the Web site.
lead_paragraph: Next week, viewers of “The X-Factor” can vote for a singer via Twitter in a partnership intended to strengthen the symbiotic relationship between television and the Web site.

headline.main: Twitter and TV Get Close to Help Each Other Grow
headline.print_headline: Twitter and TV Get Close To Help Each Other Grow
